name: Holibob
description:
holibob is an aggregator / channel manager in the activity, adventure and experience holiday market. Our software provides online travel agents, airlines and e-commerce platforms selling opportunities in this high growth market. 

holibob’s inventory is health and safety checked and quality assured. We earn commission on each sale and charge commercial partners a yearly licensing fee.

jobs.title: Sales Administrator
jobs.description:
ROLE DESCRIPTION 

Our rapidly expanding travel technology is looking for an entrepreneurial, motivated and experienced Sales Administrator. The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years experience in a marketing role, preferably within the technology ecosystem, have a passion for travel and will deliver market leading service.  
The role involves being an integral and strategic part of the team who will support, grow and drive our ability to expand our reach.   
As the basis for this role, the successful candidate will have exceptional communication skills, understanding of b2b and b2b2c sales process, be a team player and have an entrepreneurial mindset who wants to succeed.   

RESPONSIBILITIES 

Respond to all supplier and partner enquiries, escalate as required 
Disperse leads to appropriate teams 
Closing, executing agreements with suppliers, product partners and retail partners 
Completion of supplier onboarding through the processes required 
Design and deploy process, workflows as required within the sales ecosystem 
Complete supplier surveys, collect content and copy write 
Consumer sentiment reports 
Internal sales data management 
Maintain your components of SalesForce 
Record management 
Prepare, plan, book travel for the sales team and process expenses

As the basis for this role, the successful candidate will have exceptional communication skills, understanding of b2b and b2b2c sales process, be a team player and have an entrepreneurial mindset who wants to succeed.

jobs.title: Marketing Administrator
jobs.description:
ROLE DESCRIPTION 

Our rapidly expanding travel technology is looking for an entrepreneurial, motivated and experienced Marketing Administrator. The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years experience in a marketing role, preferably within the technology ecosystem, have a passion for travel and will deliver market leading service.  
The role involves being an integral and strategic part of the team who will support, grow and drive our ability to expand our reach.   
As the basis for this role, the successful candidate will have exceptional communication skills, understanding of b2b marketing, be a team player and have an entrepreneurial mindset who wants to succeed.   

RESPONSIBILITIES 

Identify opportunities to expand our social media b2b presence  
Oversee and assist in developing our content library including copy writing 
Oversee press releases, located media opportunities, central point of contact for PR 
Google analytic reports as required 
Consumer sentiment reports and highlight market trends 
Email marketing campaigns and report on outcomes 
Maintain your components of SalesForce 
Design, develop and produce annual travel market report 
Produce & maintain brand books, product books

jobs.title: Commercial Data Analyst
jobs.description:
ROLE DESCRIPTION 

Our rapidly expanding travel technology company is looking for an entrepreneurial, motivated and experienced Commercial Data Analyst to join the team. The candidate should have a minimum of 10 years experience in a similar role, preferably within the technology ecosystem, have a passion for travel and understands the importance of knowing, interpreting, predicting and digesting data that will drive our business.  
A fast-paced marketplace your analytical insights will be presented to senior stakeholders and have an actionable impact on the company. You will get the opportunity to be hands-on with millions of rows of data while also making recommendations for the wider business. 
The role involves being an integral and strategic part of the team who will support, grow and drive our ability to expand our reach.  As the basis for this role, the successful candidate will have exceptional communication skills, understanding of b2b and b2b2c business model & strategy, be a team player and have an entrepreneurial mindset who wants to succeed.   

RESPONSIBILITIES 

You will be a key part of producing customer insight for the wider online business 
You will use SQL to code and query the database in order to derive insights for the company 
You will work on customer retention and acquisition strategies 
You will present visualisations of data analysis and predications 
You will be a part of advanced analytics work too e.g. modelling and personalisation
